derivation: from G1 (ἀδόκιμος) (as a negative particle) and G1384 (ἀδόκιμος);
strongs_def: unapproved, i.e. rejected; by implication, worthless (literally or morally)
outline:
1. not standing the test, not approved
    1. properly used of metals and coins
  2. that which does not prove itself such as it ought
    1. unfit for, unproved, spurious, reprobate
